provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Spirit Licence (Noxiocs or
Detrimental Substance) Order, 1931.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The use by any person of certain liquors or ingredients commonly
called or known as 'Oil of Gin', 'Oil of Cognac', 'Essence of Brandy'
and 'Essence of Whisky' and other flavouring essences, substances or
ingredients of a similar character or composition or of any substance
containing higher alcohols or compound ethers or aldehydes or terpenes
ir the preparation of or mixture with any alcoholic liquor for sale
with the exception of rum used for blending with other rum and to
be sold as such shall be and is hereby prohibited unless the same
shall be of a brand to be approved by the Minister.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. The use by any person of the substance, liquor or ingredient G.N. 387134
commonly known as Methyl Alcohol or of any essence or substance
containing Methyl Alcohol, in the preparation of or mixture with
any alcoholic liquor for sale is hereby prohibited.
